genresAdvancedInfo.name: punjabi folk
genresAdvancedInfo.description: Punjabi folk is a traditional music genre from the Punjab region of India and Pakistan. It features lively and upbeat rhythms, often accompanied by traditional instruments such as the dhol and tumbi. The lyrics of Punjabi folk songs often tell stories of love, nature, and everyday life, and are sung in Punjabi. The genre has gained popularity in recent years, with modern Punjabi folk artists incorporating elements of pop and hip-hop into their music.
